Html: i'm trying to refresh the the graph area, and setting it a new graph, is there a way to hide the animation of removing and showing the graphs.

Set the IsAnimationEnabled property of your GraphLayout instance to false.

Disabling only the graph destruction animation: gl.DestructionTransition = null

Disabling only the animation when vertices change their position: gl.MoveAnimation = null

I've just checked in some minor changes that will solve your problem (if you follow my instructions, your ONE graph will be disappear immediately).

Get the latest source (from the hg repo), and build the project, update the Graph# references in your own project, then in your xaml set the DestructionTransition={x:Null} of your graph layout control (you don't need to set the isanimationenabled property to false).
